data.description: This spacious and newly updated, cozy, three-bedroom, two-bathroom home is completely turn-key ready. Move in and relax, as almost everything has been done for you. Freshley painted throughout, with beautiful well-maintained hardwood floors, an updated kitchen and updated main floor bathroom. The backyard is spacious, with a gazebo and deck, for your entertainment and enjoyment. The basement is finished and ready for your personal touch. The attached two car garage allows shelter from those cold winter Michigan days, extra storage or a place to send the hubby to when he's in time out. Stop by to take a peek!  The seller is offering up to $1500 in buyer's concessions.
